snippet.title: What Makes Cats Purr
snippet.description: * What Makes Cats Purr (clueweb12-0807wb-56-24527) http://cats.lovetoknow.com/What_Makes_Cats_Purr What Makes Cats PurrCats »Cats General Info »What Makes Cats Purr What Makes Cats PurrBy Ann Roberts Many cat owners find themselves wondering, "What makes cats purr?" Cats are inherently mysterious animals, and so many of their habits such as scratching, kneading and...their habits such as scratching, kneading and perching are distinctively peculiar. However, the act of purring remains one of the greater mysteries of the feline world. What Makes Cats Purr? Purring is a characteristic that is supposedly unique to the domestic cat.
